account_sid.description: The SID of the Account that created this resource

api_version.description: The API version used to create this conference

call_sid_ending_conference.description: The call SID that caused the conference to end

date_created.description: The RFC 2822 date and time in GMT that this resource was created

date_updated.description: The RFC 2822 date and time in GMT that this resource was last updated

friendly_name.description: A string that you assigned to describe this conference room

reason_conference_ended.description: The reason why a conference ended.

region.description: A string that represents the Twilio Region where the conference was mixed

sid.description: The unique string that identifies this resource

subresource_uris.description: A list of related resources identified by their relative URIs

uri.description: The URI of this resource, relative to `https://api.twilio.com`
